    • Uses of RuleDAO in info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.rewards

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void Reward.addReward(Player player, GoalDAO goalDao, RuleDAO ruleDao) 
      void ReceiveLevel.addReward(Player player, GoalDAO goalDao, RuleDAO ruleDao)
      This method awards the player a specfic lavel.
      void Points.addReward(Player player, GoalDAO goalDao, RuleDAO ruleDao)
      Awards the player the concrete amount of points and add it to the player's current points.
      void Coins.addReward(Player player, GoalDAO goalDao, RuleDAO ruleDao)
      With this method the player awards the amount of coins.
      void Badge.addReward(Player player, GoalDAO goalDao, RuleDAO ruleDao)
      With this method the player awards an badge if she/he hasn't awarded it, yet.
      void Achievement.addReward(Player player, GoalDAO goalDao, RuleDAO ruleDao)
      With this method the player awards an achievement if she/he hasn't awarded it, yet.
      abstract void Reward.addReward(PlayerGroup group, GoalDAO goalDao, RuleDAO ruleDao) 
      void ReceiveLevel.addReward(PlayerGroup group, GoalDAO goalDao, RuleDAO ruleDao)
      Awards a group of player a specific level.
      void Points.addReward(PlayerGroup group, GoalDAO goalDao, RuleDAO ruleDao)
      Awards the group of players the concrete amount of points and add them to the group's current points.
      void Coins.addReward(PlayerGroup group, GoalDAO goalDao, RuleDAO ruleDao)
      Awards a group the amount of coins and adds it to group's current amount.
      void Badge.addReward(PlayerGroup group, GoalDAO goalDao, RuleDAO ruleDao)
      With this method a group awards an badge and adds it to the list with permanent rewards, but only if this badge isn't already in the list of permanent rewards.
      void Achievement.addReward(PlayerGroup group, GoalDAO goalDao, RuleDAO ruleDao)
      With this method a group awards an achievement and adds it to the list with permanent rewards, but only if this achievement isn't already in the list of permanent rewards.

      void Task.completeTask(Organisation organisation, Player player, RuleDAO ruleDao, GoalDAO goalDao, PlayerGroupDAO groupDao, LocalDateTime finishedDate)
      If a player completed a task this method adds the task to the list of finished tasks if the player is allowed to complete this task.
